long_description: Trail junkies and alpinists alike will enjoy the streamlined women's Gregory Maya 42 Pack. Robust and light, it offers enough space for overnighters and weekends-or longer minimalist trips. Women-specific BioSync suspension mimics your own flexible joints, helping keep your movement fluid and natural as it distributes the load. Wishbone internal wire frame for load transfer. Top-loading main compartment with quick-draw top closure and front zipper access. Hydration sleeve with external access (reservoir sold separately). Compression lid with single, quick-action anodized aluminum hook closure. The Gregory Maya 42 Pack features an integrated, color-matched rain cover. External zip lid pocket with key clip; stretch front pocket; dual external side pockets; dual quick-access waist belt pockets; under-lid zip stash pocket. Dual low-profile front daisy chains; dual hideaway ice axe/trekking pole loops; shoulder strap sunglass loop and hydration tube clip.
short_description: Trail junkies and alpinists alike will enjoy the streamlined women's Gregory Maya 42 Pack. Robust and light, it offers enough space for overnighters and weekends-or longer minimalist trips.
